line: We come into the dark room and see a giant shining portal embedded into the far wall.
Right in front of this portal stands a woman with large white wings.
At her feet lay mangled bodies of what were seemingly once guards, carpet red with blood.
"So you did fall here after all."
The maid assumes a combat stance.
"And you even tamed yourself some echoes already."
"I doubt you remember who I am, but it matters not."
"Just let me see what remained of your strength, and I'll let you return to your merry adventure."
